pages.text: $(li)The Redstone Block is a new block that can be used to save $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone)Redstone$(/l) in a more efficient way.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:redstone/supplementaries/cog_block)Cog Block$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l) too.
$(li)The Redstone Block emits a constant redstone signal to nearby blocks.
